name: Hero Of Creta
description:
They discovered that you has the ability to transform into a minotaur, because your power, they will do anything to kill you, including doing a pact with monsters they fear.

You need to kill every enemy that try it and save your self!

This game was posted to Ludum Dare 35, please rate us here

Credits to: @rafaeltonholo, @ChristoYogi, @k30v1n

Any feedback is welcome!
Follow us on itch.io ♥
